tr_quotes.quote: Bir kayıptan ders çıkarırsan kaybetmiş olmazsın.
tr_quotes.author: Austin O’Malley

tr_quotes.quote: Ne olduğuna değil, ne olacağına bakın.
tr_quotes.author: Marsha Petrie Sue

tr_quotes.quote: Başarısızlık yoktur. Sadece deneyimler ve onlara karşı tepkileriniz vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Tom Krause

tr_quotes.quote: Bugün kaybedersen, yarın kazan. Meydan okumanın bu ebedi ruhunda, bir galibin kalbi vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

tr_quotes.quote: Başkalarının ne yaptığına veya yapmadığına dikkat etmek yerine, ne yapıp yapmadığınıza dikkat edin
tr_quotes.author: Dhammapada

tr_quotes.quote: Geçmişin seni geriye çekmesine izin verme; güzel şeyler kaçırırsın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hiç hata yapmamış bir insan, asla yeni bir şey denememiştir.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Hatalar yaptıysanız, sizin için başka bir fırsat her zaman vardır. Seçtiğiniz bir zamanda yeni bir başlangıç yapabilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Mary Pickford

tr_quotes.quote: Özgürlük hata yapma hürriyetini içermiyorsa sahip olmaya değmez.
tr_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

tr_quotes.quote: İçeride düşman yoksa dışarıdaki düşmanlar seni incitemez.
tr_quotes.author: Afrika Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Pişmanlıklar hayallerin yerini almadığı sürece bir insan yaşlı değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Sert bir düşüş sert bir sıçrama demektir...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ders alınmış başarısızlık başarı demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan bir başarısızlıktan diğerine heyecanla koşabilmeli.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başarısızlıklar güçlülerin gücüne güç katar
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gençliğin parlak lügatinde başarısızlık diye bir kelime olmamalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatta bir tek başarısızlık vardır, o da denememek
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek başarısızlar yanılgılarını deneyimleri ile düzeltmeyenlerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başarı güçlü olana gülümser başarısızlık zayıflara çullanır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başarısızlık hayat menüsünün parçasıdır ve ben hiç yemek seçmem.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başarısızlıklarımız başarılarımıza destek veren yardımcılardır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir başarıdan bir satır başarısızlıktan bir kitap öğrenebilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın düşmesi başarısızlık değildir. Ama düşüp kalkmaması başarısızlıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başarısızlık daha zekice başlama fırsatından başka bir şey değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer yaşamında hiç başarısızlık yoksa yeterli kadar risk almamışsın demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yenilince ümitsizliğe kapılma her başarısızlıkta bir zafer arzusu yatar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başarısız olmamızda kırk milyon neden olabilir ama bir tane bile bahane yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başarısız insanların yollarındaki taşlar başarılı olanlar için birer basamaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayattaki çoğu başarısızlık vazgeçtiklerinde başarmaya ne kadar yakın olduğunun farkında olmayan insanlardır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Lüzumundan fazla ciddi ve zeki görünmeye özen gösteren kimse başarısızlığa uğrar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendine güven kazanmanın en mükemmel yolu başarısızlığa imkân vermeyecek derecede iyi hazırlanmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Üç kere başarısız oldum ile ben başarısızım demek arasındaki farka dikkat etmelisiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başarısız olma yeteneğine gereksinmemiz vardır. Hata yapmayı gönüllü olarak kabul etmedikçe keşiflerde bulunamazsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ya başlamamalı, ya da bitirmeli.
tr_quotes.author: Ovidius

tr_quotes.quote: En büyük zaman hırsızı kararsızlıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Floru

tr_quotes.quote: Kaybetmek, kazanmanın bir parçasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Dick Munro

tr_quotes.quote: Aradığını bilmeyen, bulduğunu anlayamaz.
tr_quotes.author: Claude Bernard

tr_quotes.quote: Güçlükler başarının değerini artıran süslerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Moliere

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatta bir tek başarısızlık vardır. O da denememektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan bir başarısızlıktan diğerine heyecanla koşabilmeli.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek başarı başarısızlık korkusunu yenebilmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Sweeney

tr_quotes.quote: Ders alınmış başarısızlık başarı demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Malcolm S. Forbes

tr_quotes.quote: Başarı güçlü olana gülümser, başarısızlık zayıflara çullanır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: En büyük derslerimi başarısızlıklarımdan aldım.
tr_quotes.author: Humphrey Davy

tr_quotes.quote: Başarının yüzde doksan dokuzu başarısızlıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Soichiro Honda

tr_quotes.quote: Gençliğin parlak lügatinde başarısızlık diye bir kelime yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başarısızlıklarımız başarılarımıza destek veren yardımcılardır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başarısızlıklar, kuvvetlilere daha da kuvvet verir.
tr_quotes.author: William Whewell

tr_quotes.quote: Başarıdan bir satır, başarısızlıktan bir kitap öğrenebilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başarısızlık, daha zekice başlama fırsatından başka bir şey değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar başarısızlığa uğramazlar, denemekten vazgeçerler.
tr_quotes.author: Elihu Root

tr_quotes.quote: Başarısızlığı beklemek, başarısızlığın onda dokuzudur.
tr_quotes.author: Francis Crawford

tr_quotes.quote: Başarınızı ilk unutan, başarısızlığınızı ilk gören siz olun.
tr_quotes.author: Mümin Sekman

tr_quotes.quote: Başarısızlık dünyadaki en kötü şey değildir, en kötüsü hiç denememektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın düşmesi başarısızlık değildir. Ama düşüp kalkmaması başarısızlıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yapabildiğimiz her şeyi yapsaydık, buna kendimiz bile şaşardık.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Edison

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer yaşamında hiç başarısızlık yoksa, yeterli kadar risk almamışsın demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Büyük girişimlerde başarısızlığa uğramak bile ihtişamlıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Cassius Longinus

tr_quotes.quote: Başarısız olmamızda kırk milyon neden olabilir ama bir tane bile bahane yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Erişmek istedikleri bir hedefi olmayanlar, çalışmaktan zevk almazlar.
tr_quotes.author: Emile Raux

tr_quotes.quote: Başarısız insanların yollarındaki taşlar, başarılı olanlar için birer basamaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir kişi başarısızlığa uğramış ise, o kişi sınırlarına meydan okumamıştır.
tr_quotes.author: Porsche

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanoğlu başarmak için doğmuştur, başarısızlığa uğramak için değil.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Thoreau

tr_quotes.quote: Yapabileceğinize de inansanız, yapamayacağınıza da inansanız haklı çıkarsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Ford

tr_quotes.quote: Hiç kimse, hiçbir zaman büyük hatalar yapmadan başarılı olmadı.
tr_quotes.author: William Gladstone

tr_quotes.quote: Engeller beni durduramaz, her bir engel kararlılığımı daha da güçlendirir.
tr_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

tr_quotes.quote: Düşünmek ve söylemek kolay, fakat yaşamak, hele başarı ile sonuçlandırmak çok zordur.
tr_quotes.author: Ziya Gökalp

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer sizde deha varsa çalışkanlık bunu inkişaf ettirir. Eğer yoksa onun yerini doldurur.
tr_quotes.author: Reynolds

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatta yapabileceğiniz en büyük hata, sürekli bir hata daha yapacağımız korkusudur.
tr_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

tr_quotes.quote: Başarıya ulaşamayanların yüzde doksanı yenilgiye uğramamıştır. Sadece pes etmişlerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Paul J. Meyer

tr_quotes.quote: Yenilgiye uğrayınca umutsuzluğa kapılma, her başarısızlıkta bir zafer duygusu yatar.
tr_quotes.author: Germain Martin

tr_quotes.quote: Kendine güven kazanmanın en mükemmel yolu başarısızlığa imkân vermeyecek derecede iyi hazırlanmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan sahip olduklarının toplamı değil, henüz gerçekleştiremediklerinin toplamıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Jean Paul-Sartre

tr_quotes.quote: Hayattaki çoğu başarısızlık vazgeçtiklerinde başarmaya ne kadar yakın olduğunun farkında olmayan insanların başarısızlıklarıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başarısızlıkların yüzde doksan dokuzu mazeret alışkanlığı olan insanlar tarafından gelmektedir.
tr_quotes.author: George Carver

tr_quotes.quote: Yapabileceğinizin en iyisini yapıyorsanız, başarısızlık hakkında endişelenmenize gerek yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Robert Hillyer

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer hepimiz, yapabileceğimiz her şeyi yapsaydık, şaşkınlıktan kendi aklımızı başımızdan alırdık.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Başarmak için başarısızlığa uğramanız gerekir. Böylece bir daha ki sefere ne yapacağınızı bilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Anthony D’Angelo

tr_quotes.quote: Size başarının formülünü veremem, ama size başarısızlığın formülünü verebilirim; Herkesi memnun etmeye çalışmak.
tr_quotes.author: Herbert Swope

tr_quotes.quote: Başarısız olan insanlar iki gruba ayrılır, düşünüp hiçbir zaman yapmayanlar ve yapıp hiçbir zaman düşünmeyenlerdir.
tr_quotes.author: Herbert Swope

tr_quotes.quote: Bazı yenilgilerin nedeni, insanların işi yarıda bıraktıklarında, başarıya ne kadar yakın olduklarını bilememeleridir.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Edison

tr_quotes.quote: Hiç kimse satrançta her hamlede ilerleyerek bir oyun kazanamadı. Bazen ileri bir adım atmak için bir adım geriye çekilmeniz gerekir.
tr_quotes.author: Amar Bose

tr_quotes.quote: En şanlı hayatlara bile başarısızlığın girmesi kaçınılmazdır. Yenilgide hiçbir zaman insan ruhu ölmez, vazgeçtiğinde ölür.
tr_quotes.author: Ben Stein

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes by losing a battle you find a new way to win the war
en_quotes.author: Donald Trump

en_quotes.quote: Failure comes only when we forget our ideals and objectives and principles
en_quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

en_quotes.quote: Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail. Failure is another steppingstone to greatness
en_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

en_quotes.quote: Every adversity, every failure, every heartache carries with it the seed of an equal or greater benefit
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

en_quotes.quote: Don't be afraid of missing opportunities. Behind every failure is an opportunity somebody wishes they had missed
en_quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

en_quotes.quote: The difference between average people and achieving people is their perception of and response to failure
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: My great concern is not whether you have failed, but whether you are content with your failure
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: Failure happens all the time. It happens every day in practice. What makes you better is how you react to it
en_quotes.author: Mia Hamm

en_quotes.quote: Without failure there is no achievement
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: Every stumble is not a fall, and every fall does not mean failure
en_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

en_quotes.quote: Socialism in general has a record of failure so blatant that only an intellectual could ignore or evade it
en_quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

en_quotes.quote: If you try to do your best there is no failure
en_quotes.author: Mike Farrell

en_quotes.quote: I believe in never giving up, no matter what the odds. My mantra is, 'Failure is temporary. Giving up is permanent.'
en_quotes.author: Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw

en_quotes.quote: I fell off my pink cloud with a thud
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

en_quotes.quote: Failure is unimportant. It takes courage to make a fool of yourself
en_quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

en_quotes.quote: Your attitude towards failure determines your altitude after failure
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: It's best to have failure happen early in life. It wakes up the Phoenix bird in you so you rise from the ashes
en_quotes.author: Anne Baxter

en_quotes.quote: A man can fail many times, but he isn't a failure until he begins to blame somebody else
en_quotes.author: John Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: He who risks and fails can be forgiven. He who never risks and never fails is a failure in his whole being
en_quotes.author: Paul Tillich

en_quotes.quote: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows
en_quotes.author: Buddha

en_quotes.quote: If you fall during your life, it doesn't matter. You're never a failure as long as you try to get up
en_quotes.author: Evel Knievel

en_quotes.quote: Progress requires setbacks; the only sure way to avoid failure is not to try
en_quotes.author: Henry Spencer

en_quotes.quote: Laziness is a secret ingredient that goes into failure. But it's only kept a secret from the person who fails
en_quotes.author: Robert Half

en_quotes.quote: Show me a good and gracious loser and I'll show you a failure
en_quotes.author: Knute Rockne

en_quotes.quote: Failure doesn't mean you are a failure it just means you haven't succeeded yet
en_quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

en_quotes.quote: Even as far back as when I started acting at 14, I know I've never considered failure
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Lawrence

en_quotes.quote: You have to be able to accept failure to get better
en_quotes.author: LeBron James

en_quotes.quote: Mistakes are the portals of discovery
en_quotes.author: James Joyce

en_quotes.quote: Women, like men, should try to do the impossible. And when they fail, their failure should be a challenge to others
en_quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

en_quotes.quote: If something's important enough, you should try. Even if you - the probable outcome is failure
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: Honesty is the fastest way to prevent a mistake from turning into a failure
en_quotes.author: James Altucher

en_quotes.quote: My life has been nothing but a failure
en_quotes.author: Claude Monet

en_quotes.quote: To err is human, but it feels divine
en_quotes.author: Mae West

en_quotes.quote: I really do think that putting expectations on a holiday is setting yourself up for failure
en_quotes.author: Delilah

en_quotes.quote: Feminism is doomed to failure because it is based on an attempt to repeal and restructure human nature
en_quotes.author: Phyllis Schlafly

en_quotes.quote: Failure doesn't kill you... it increases your desire to make something happen
en_quotes.author: Kevin Costner

en_quotes.quote: No man can be a failure if he thinks he's a success; If he thinks he is a winner, then he is
en_quotes.author: Robert W. Service

en_quotes.quote: Your ability to adapt to failure, and navigate your way out of it, absolutely 100 percent makes you who you are
en_quotes.author: Viola Davis

en_quotes.quote: A man can get discouraged many times but he is not a failure until he begins to blame somebody else and stops trying
en_quotes.author: John Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: But man is not made for defeat. A man can be destroyed but not defeated
en_quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

en_quotes.quote: I think and think for months and years. Ninety-nine times, the conclusion is false. The hundredth time I am right
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: If there exists no possibility of failure, then victory is meaningless
en_quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

en_quotes.quote: Why should anybody be interested in some old man who was a failure?
en_quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

en_quotes.quote: Man is not made for defeat
en_quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

en_quotes.quote: There is no such thing as failure. There are only results
en_quotes.author: Tony Robbins

en_quotes.quote: Failure after long perseverance is much grander than never to have a striving good enough to be called a failure
en_quotes.author: George Eliot

en_quotes.quote: There is a 90% failure rate for most shows. It's difficult for any show to write for the next season
en_quotes.author: Matt Passmore

en_quotes.quote: Show me a thoroughly satisfied man and I will show you a failure
en_quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

en_quotes.quote: If you're doing your best, you won't have any time to worry about failure
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Failure is nature's plan to prepare you for great responsibilities
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

en_quotes.quote: Testing leads to failure, and failure leads to understanding
en_quotes.author: Burt Rutan

en_quotes.quote: If you're not failing every now and again, it's a sign you're not doing anything very innovative
en_quotes.author: Woody Allen

en_quotes.quote: If a building looks better under construction than it does when finished, then it's a failure
en_quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

en_quotes.quote: A failure establishes only this, that our determination to succeed was not strong enough
en_quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

en_quotes.quote: To a certain extent, I enjoy failure. It's part of the game. There's always room to grow; there's room to improve
en_quotes.author: Aaron Judge

en_quotes.quote: Do not let your ambitions become a sanctuary for your failures
en_quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

en_quotes.quote: I don't see divorce as a failure. I see it as the end to a story. In a story, everything has an end and a beginning
en_quotes.author: Olga Kurylenko

en_quotes.quote: Aging is mostly the failure to repair
en_quotes.author: Gregory Benford

en_quotes.quote: Ultimately there is no such thing as failure. There are lessons learned in different ways
en_quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

en_quotes.quote: Students rarely disappoint teachers who assure them in advance that they are doomed to failure
en_quotes.author: Sidney Hook

en_quotes.quote: We are human beings, at the end of the day. Success and failure are a part and parcel of our life
en_quotes.author: Hima Das

en_quotes.quote: A failure doesn't mean you are unworthy, nor does it preclude success on the next try
en_quotes.author: Leonard Mlodinow

en_quotes.quote: It is often the failure who is the pioneer in new lands, new undertakings, and new forms of expression
en_quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

en_quotes.quote: Success needs no explanation. Failure does not have one that matters
en_quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

en_quotes.quote: Success is more difficult to handle than failure
en_quotes.author: Ravi Zacharias

en_quotes.quote: If anyone has seen success and failure on a global stage, it's my friend Steve Forbes
en_quotes.author: Peter Diamandis

en_quotes.quote: Some teachers feel that if they ask for emotional help, they're a failure. But teaching is a team sport
en_quotes.author: Erin Gruwell

en_quotes.quote: The most important of my discoveries have been suggested to me by my failures
en_quotes.author: Humphry Davy

en_quotes.quote: Schools don't really allow failure and yet it's a valid part of any endeavour, not just writing
en_quotes.author: Roddy Doyle

en_quotes.quote: Civilization is a failure. We need to think what we can do together in love and peace
en_quotes.author: Serj Tankian

en_quotes.quote: There is no innovation and creativity without failure. Period
en_quotes.author: Brene Brown

en_quotes.quote: Failure is instructive. The person who really thinks learns quite as much from his failures as from his successes
en_quotes.author: John Dewey

en_quotes.quote: Remember that failure is an event, not a person
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: Ambition is the last refuge of the failure
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: All the world loves a good loser
en_quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: Failure at some point in your life is inevitable, but giving up is unforgivable
en_quotes.author: Joe Biden

en_quotes.quote: The only failure is not to try
en_quotes.author: George Clooney

en_quotes.quote: The guns and the bombs, the rockets and the warships, are all symbols of human failure
en_quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

en_quotes.quote: If you learn from defeat, you haven't really lost
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: There is no loneliness greater than the loneliness of a failure. The failure is a stranger in his own house
en_quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

en_quotes.quote: A failure will not appear until a unit has passed final inspection
en_quotes.author: Arthur Bloch

en_quotes.quote: The main failure of education is that it has not prepared people to comprehend matters concerning human destiny
en_quotes.author: Norman Cousins

en_quotes.quote: It is in our genes that we think of breaking up when we love and of failure and fall when we succeed
en_quotes.author: RM

en_quotes.quote: Engineering is achieving function while avoiding failure
en_quotes.author: Henry Petroski

en_quotes.quote: Who I am as a guitarist is defined by my failure to become Jimi Hendrix
en_quotes.author: John Mayer

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes the best gain is to lose
en_quotes.author: George Herbert

en_quotes.quote: You don't go into anything contemplating failure, because if you did, you wouldn't make it
en_quotes.author: Simon Cowell

en_quotes.quote: Never fret for an only son, the idea of failure will never occur to him
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: Failure is never fatal. But failure to change can and might be
en_quotes.author: John Wooden

en_quotes.quote: Failure is impossible
en_quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

en_quotes.quote: When I was young, I observed that nine out of ten things I did were failures. So I did ten times more work
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: My reputation grows with every failure
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same
en_quotes.author: Colin R. Davis

en_quotes.quote: There is no such thing as darkness; only a failure to see
en_quotes.author: Malcolm Muggeridge

en_quotes.quote: An essential aspect of creativity is not being afraid to fail
en_quotes.author: Edwin Land

en_quotes.quote: Success represents the 1% of your work which results from the 99% that is called failure
en_quotes.author: Soichiro Honda

en_quotes.quote: To me, all war is failure for humanity, though it often is a bounty for commerce
en_quotes.author: Mark Edwards

en_quotes.quote: If we don't succeed we run the risk of failure
en_quotes.author: Dan Quayle

en_quotes.quote: In America, there's a failure to appreciate Europe's leading role in the world
en_quotes.author: Barack Obama

en_quotes.quote: Not failure, but low aim is sin
en_quotes.author: Benjamin E. Mays

en_quotes.quote: Our best successes often come after our greatest disappointments
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: It is easier to win than to fail. Everybody sides with the winner. But the failure walks alone
en_quotes.author: George Matthew Adams

en_quotes.quote: I was very afraid of failure because if you fail at something you love, then you ruin what you love
en_quotes.author: Kimbal Musk

en_quotes.quote: I love my flops. Look at my life: my failure that broke my heart made me stronger
en_quotes.author: Pooja Bhatt

en_quotes.quote: Failure has been my best friend as a writer. It tests you, to see if you have what it takes to see it through
en_quotes.author: Markus Zusak

en_quotes.quote: There is not a fiercer hell than the failure in a great object
en_quotes.author: John Keats

en_quotes.quote: Failure means a stripping away of the inessential
en_quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

en_quotes.quote: The only real failure in life is one not learned from
en_quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

en_quotes.quote: There is no failure except in no longer trying
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: Optimism is a kind of heart stimulant - the digitalis of failure
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: The only risk of failure is promotion
en_quotes.author: Scott Adams

en_quotes.quote: You gotta lose 'em some of the time. When you do, lose 'em right
en_quotes.author: Casey Stengel

en_quotes.quote: There's no right or wrong, success or failure
en_quotes.author: Miley Cyrus

en_quotes.quote: I never see failure as failure, but only as the game I must play and win
en_quotes.author: Tom Hopkins

en_quotes.quote: You make mistakes. Mistakes don't make you
en_quotes.author: Maxwell Maltz

en_quotes.quote: Failure to prepare is preparing to fail
en_quotes.author: Mike Murdock

en_quotes.quote: As an outside; don't worry about failure, because failure will take care of itself. Focus on success
en_quotes.author: Henry Cavill

en_quotes.quote: I'm living life as best I can - but I'm not exempt from failure and making bad choices
en_quotes.author: LeAnn Rimes

en_quotes.quote: We're born with success. It is only others who point out our failures, and what they attribute to us as failure
en_quotes.author: Whoopi Goldberg

en_quotes.quote: I'm full of self-doubt. I doubt everything I do. Everything I do is a failure
en_quotes.author: John Banville

en_quotes.quote: Without failure there is no sweetness in success. There's no understanding of it
en_quotes.author: Glenn Beck

en_quotes.quote: If one's man's trash is another man's treasure, then one industry's potential failure is another's opportunity
en_quotes.author: Adam Lashinsky

en_quotes.quote: Success and failure is temporary. So don't let them get to you
en_quotes.author: Sai Pallavi

en_quotes.quote: There is no doubt that the Mindset failure is a major setback for Axovant, but it is not the end of the road
en_quotes.author: Vivek Ramaswamy

en_quotes.quote: A love of nature is a consolation against failure
en_quotes.author: Berthe Morisot

en_quotes.quote: My father was not a failure. After all, he was the father of a president of the United States
en_quotes.author: Harry S Truman

en_quotes.quote: I don't believe in failure. It is not failure if you enjoyed the process
en_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

en_quotes.quote: The wisest of the wise may err
en_quotes.author: Aeschylus

en_quotes.quote: The failure to invest in youth reflects a lack of compassion and a colossal failure of common sense
en_quotes.author: Coretta Scott King

en_quotes.quote: Not failure, but low aim, is crime
en_quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

en_quotes.quote: One of the things I definitely think of as a driver of me is fear. And it's fear of failure, fear of being overtaken
en_quotes.author: Jocko Willink

en_quotes.quote: I don't lose any sleep at night over the potential for failure. I cannot even spell the word
en_quotes.author: Jim Mattis

en_quotes.quote: Success is 99 percent failure
en_quotes.author: Soichiro Honda

en_quotes.quote: Ambitious failure, magnificent failure, is a very good thing
en_quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

en_quotes.quote: War is failure of diplomacy
en_quotes.author: John Dingell

en_quotes.quote: The will to persevere is often the difference between failure and success
en_quotes.author: David Sarnoff

en_quotes.quote: Failure sometimes enlarges the spirit. You have to fall back upon humanity and God
en_quotes.author: Charles Horton Cooley

en_quotes.quote: Fear comes in two packages fear of failure, and sometimes, fear of success
en_quotes.author: Tom Kite

en_quotes.quote: There are no mistakes, save one: the failure to learn from a mistake
en_quotes.author: Robert Fripp

en_quotes.quote: I'd rather be a failure at something I love than a success at something I hate
en_quotes.author: George Burns

en_quotes.quote: Do not blame anybody for your mistakes and failures
en_quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

en_quotes.quote: A failure is a man who has blundered, but is not able to cash in the experience
en_quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: Success and failure are equally disastrous
en_quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

en_quotes.quote: I think my whole life, because of where I came from, I had a fear of failure
en_quotes.author: Howard Schultz

en_quotes.quote: We have forty million reasons for failure, but not a single excuse
en_quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

en_quotes.quote: There could be no honor in a sure success, but much might be wrested from a sure defeat
en_quotes.author: Ann Landers

en_quotes.quote: All human actions are equivalent... and all are on principle doomed to failure
en_quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

en_quotes.quote: I've accepted that I was a failure in politics. I was not qualified for the job
en_quotes.author: Amitabh Bachchan

en_quotes.quote: I've never been a jealous person, and I've never felt built up by someone else's failure - that's a cheap thrill
en_quotes.author: Matthew McConaughey

en_quotes.quote: The thing I always say to people is this: 'If you avoid failure, you also avoid success.'
en_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

en_quotes.quote: The great question is not whether you have failed, but whether you are content with failure
en_quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

en_quotes.quote: There are many victories worse than a defeat
en_quotes.author: George Eliot

en_quotes.quote: The only failure one should fear, is not hugging to the purpose they see as best
en_quotes.author: George Eliot

en_quotes.quote: There is only one failure in life possible, and that is not to be true to the best one knows
en_quotes.author: George Eliot

en_quotes.quote: Whether in success or in failure, I'm proud of every single movie I've ever directed
en_quotes.author: Steven Spielberg

en_quotes.quote: Revolutionaries were depressed and close to emotional breakdown; after the failure, they left successively
en_quotes.author: Sun Yat-sen

en_quotes.quote: My thing with failure, just forget about it and get up and do it again
en_quotes.author: JoJo Siwa

en_quotes.quote: I think you have to try and fail, because failure gets you closer to what you're good at
en_quotes.author: Louis C. K.

en_quotes.quote: Failure is a word unknown to me
en_quotes.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

en_quotes.quote: Failure to accord credit to anyone for what he may have done is a great weakness in any man
en_quotes.author: William Howard Taft

en_quotes.quote: The idea of capitalism is not just success but also the failure that allows success to happen
en_quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

en_quotes.quote: Adam Smith's huge failure was the fact that he did not foresee the industrial revolution
en_quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

en_quotes.quote: Confidence is contagious, but so is failure. Even the Yankees will lose if you persuade them that they will
en_quotes.author: Rosabeth Moss Kanter

en_quotes.quote: All human actions are equivalent and all are on principle doomed to failure
en_quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

en_quotes.quote: Without exposure to potential failure, there is no risk
en_quotes.author: Brennan Manning

en_quotes.quote: Failure has gone to his head
en_quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

en_quotes.quote: Failure is good. It's fertilizer. Everything I've learned about coaching, I've learned from making mistakes
en_quotes.author: Rick Pitino

en_quotes.quote: I want to swim in both directions at once. Desire success, court failure
en_quotes.author: Alan Rickman

en_quotes.quote: The man who has won millions at the cost of his conscience is a failure
en_quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

en_quotes.quote: Don't think of it as failure. Think of it as time-released success
en_quotes.author: Robert Orben

en_quotes.quote: If at first you don't succeed, failure may be your style
en_quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

en_quotes.quote: If we don't succeed, we run the risk of failure
en_quotes.author: Al Gore

en_quotes.quote: If you're not a born-again Christian, you're a failure as a human being
en_quotes.author: Jerry Falwell

en_quotes.quote: There's a difference between a failure and a fiasco... a fiasco is a disaster of mythic proportions
en_quotes.author: Orlando Bloom

en_quotes.quote: When people have a willpower failure, it's because they haven't anticipated a situation that's going to come along
en_quotes.author: Charles Duhigg

en_quotes.quote: The way most people fail is in not keeping up the heart
en_quotes.author: Lady Gregory

en_quotes.quote: I'm quite detached from failure and success. Once a shooting is done, I kind of close that chapter in my life
en_quotes.author: Ranbir Kapoor

en_quotes.quote: We may be personally defeated, but our principles never!
en_quotes.author: William Lloyd Garrison

en_quotes.quote: We climb to heaven most often on the ruins of our cherished plans, finding our failures were successes
en_quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

en_quotes.quote: Failure usually works for me in the end
en_quotes.author: David Hasselhoff

en_quotes.quote: Success and failure go hand in hand
en_quotes.author: Sangram Singh

en_quotes.quote: The probability of failure doesn't matter to me
en_quotes.author: Vinod Khosla

en_quotes.quote: Indecision and delays are the parents of failure
en_quotes.author: George Canning

en_quotes.quote: I'm very comfortable with failure. I'm very comfortable being the guy who disappoints people
en_quotes.author: Steven Soderbergh

en_quotes.quote: It is wise to keep in mind that neither success nor failure is ever final
en_quotes.author: Roger Babson

en_quotes.quote: Don't come home a failure
en_quotes.author: Ty Cobb

en_quotes.quote: Success is a lousy teacher, but failure is a friend, philosopher, and guide
en_quotes.author: Ayushmann Khurrana

en_quotes.quote: So many times in my life, people have tried to make me a failure
en_quotes.author: Keyshawn Johnson

en_quotes.quote: The only real failure is giving up
en_quotes.author: Scooter Braun

en_quotes.quote: At least I have the modesty to admit that lack of modesty is one of my failings
en_quotes.author: Hector Berlioz

en_quotes.quote: The surest way to fail is not to determine to succeed
en_quotes.author: Richard Brinsley Sheridan

en_quotes.quote: Remember what Susan B. Anthony said? 'Failure is impossible.' Failure is possible if women don't vote
en_quotes.author: Madeleine M. Kunin

en_quotes.quote: Failure is a fundamental factor of success
en_quotes.author: Nina Tassler

en_quotes.quote: Failure and its accompanying misery is for the artist his most vital source of creative energy
en_quotes.author: Montgomery Clift

en_quotes.quote: I find rejection or failure to be a really interesting and valuable experience
en_quotes.author: Brian Grazer

en_quotes.quote: The failure of one regional bank, assuming it is following a traditional model, will not threaten the entire system
en_quotes.author: Sherrod Brown

en_quotes.quote: Failure is what we're all running from, we're always running toward success with failure at our back
en_quotes.author: Natalie Goldberg

en_quotes.quote: You can't be afraid of failure and you can't be afraid of success, because either one gets in the way of your work
en_quotes.author: Dave Van Ronk

en_quotes.quote: There is only one real failure in life that is possible, and that is, not to be true to the best one knows
en_quotes.author: Frederic William Farrar

en_quotes.quote: As a younger player, you always kind of play with that fear of failure
en_quotes.author: Jason Giambi

en_quotes.quote: Success without someone to share it with is hollow indeed. On the other hand, it beats the heck out of failure
en_quotes.author: Judith McNaught

en_quotes.quote: Destiny: A tyrant's authority for crime and a fool's excuse for failure
en_quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

en_quotes.quote: There are some defeats more triumphant than victories
en_quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes we never see what failure is and often fail to recognize it
en_quotes.author: Naveen Jain

en_quotes.quote: Crime and bad lives are the measure of a State's failure, all crime in the end is the crime of the community
en_quotes.author: H. G. Wells

en_quotes.quote: A hatred of failure has always been part of my nature
en_quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

en_quotes.quote: I feel that marriage can lead to the ultimate rejection and failure and divorce and things we all fear
en_quotes.author: Mike Birbiglia

en_quotes.quote: A real failure does not need an excuse. It is an end in itself
en_quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

en_quotes.quote: Success is usually the culmination of controlling failure
en_quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

en_quotes.quote: In politics, what begins in fear usually ends in failure
en_quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

en_quotes.quote: War remains the decisive human failure
en_quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

en_quotes.quote: It is not a disgrace to fail. Failing is one of the greatest arts in the world
en_quotes.author: Charles Kettering

en_quotes.quote: In our business, things look like a failure until they're not. It's pretty binary transitions
en_quotes.author: Satya Nadella

en_quotes.quote: About the only problem with success is that it does not teach you how to deal with failure
en_quotes.author: Tommy Lasorda

en_quotes.quote: We dissect failure a lot more than we dissect success
en_quotes.author: Matthew McConaughey

en_quotes.quote: Greatly begin. Though thou have time, but for a line, be that sublime. Not failure, but low aim is crime
en_quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

en_quotes.quote: I read less and less. I have not forgiven books for their failure to tell me the truth and make me happy
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: I'm a polarizing person, so people get caught up in hoping I fail. And just like success, failure is a perspective
en_quotes.author: CM Punk

en_quotes.quote: The human spirit is so resilient, and failure teaches you so much
en_quotes.author: Molly Bloom

en_quotes.quote: I'd spent life so terrified of failure that when it happened, it was very liberating
en_quotes.author: Molly Bloom

en_quotes.quote: I think the fall in Eden was ultimately a failure to give thanks
en_quotes.author: Ann Voskamp

en_quotes.quote: But while success and failure depend on conditions, the mind neither waxes nor wanes
en_quotes.author: Bodhidharma

en_quotes.quote: Pride is ugly. It says, 'If you succeed, I am a failure.'
en_quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

en_quotes.quote: So many financial dreams are thwarted by the failure to act upon good intentions
en_quotes.author: Suze Orman

en_quotes.quote: Apple is a failure because they missed social? Nobody would say that, because they are having great success
en_quotes.author: Steve Ballmer

en_quotes.quote: My feeling, based on my own experience, is that aiming for grandiosity is the fastest route to failure
en_quotes.author: James Altucher

en_quotes.quote: Once you can accept failure, you can have fun and success
en_quotes.author: Rickey Henderson

en_quotes.quote: I feel, in the end, as if everything I've done has been a failure
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Kozol

en_quotes.quote: My biggest failure is I have too many to talk about
en_quotes.author: Dean Kamen

en_quotes.quote: I believe that every person's failure is their fault, every single time
en_quotes.author: Jon Taffer

en_quotes.quote: On 'Bar Rescue,' failure is not an option. I have to try to turn the business around
en_quotes.author: Jon Taffer

en_quotes.quote: Failure has never been a signal for me to quit; it's always been a sign for me to go down another path
en_quotes.author: Jesse Itzler

en_quotes.quote: A joke is a way to say, 'I'm going to do something funny now. If I don't get a laugh at the end, I'm a failure.'
en_quotes.author: Penn Jillette

en_quotes.quote: Fear of failure is caused by lack of self-esteem and confidence. Dealing with fear is the key to super success
en_quotes.author: Dan Pena

en_quotes.quote: If my child had prejudice in his head, I'd be ashamed. I would see it as my failure as a parent
en_quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

en_quotes.quote: What America does best is produce the ability to accept failure
en_quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

en_quotes.quote: Failure is always an option
en_quotes.author: Adam Savage

en_quotes.quote: One of the reasons people stop learning is that they become less and less willing to risk failure
en_quotes.author: John W. Gardner

en_quotes.quote: Yes, 'Aagadu' was a failure. I was dejected for a couple of months, since there was a lot at stake
en_quotes.author: Mahesh Babu

en_quotes.quote: I expect either total success or total failure. That's my lot in life
en_quotes.author: Varg Vikernes

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes failure isn't an opportunity in disguise, it's just you
en_quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes the best lighting of all is a power failure
en_quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

en_quotes.quote: Failure too is a form of death
en_quotes.author: Graham Greene

en_quotes.quote: Success is more dangerous than failure, the ripples break over a wider coastline
en_quotes.author: Graham Greene

en_quotes.quote: The failure of world leaders to act on the critical issue of global warming is often blamed on economic considerations
en_quotes.author: David Suzuki

en_quotes.quote: Coming to terms with the fact that my marriage was a failure was devastating and very difficult
en_quotes.author: Sarah McLachlan

en_quotes.quote: Translation is the art of failure
en_quotes.author: Umberto Eco

en_quotes.quote: I realized that I was afraid to really, really try something, 100%, because I had never reached true failure
en_quotes.author: Trent Reznor

en_quotes.quote: A life which does not go into action is a failure
en_quotes.author: Arnold J. Toynbee

en_quotes.quote: I constantly experience failure in that my work is never as good as I want it to be. So I live with failure
en_quotes.author: Jeremy Irons

en_quotes.quote: Being a pathfinder is to be willing to risk failure and still go on
en_quotes.author: Gail Sheehy

en_quotes.quote: When preaching is done right, it can change lives. When it's done badly, my failure goes beyond the merely human
en_quotes.author: John Ortberg

en_quotes.quote: Those who refuse to liberalise and globalise are doomed to failure
en_quotes.author: Yuval Noah Harari

en_quotes.quote: I like the possibility of failure. I don't want to be in a comfortable zone
en_quotes.author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

en_quotes.quote: When you accept that failure is a good thing, it can actually be a huge propeller toward success
en_quotes.author: Whitney Wolfe Herd

en_quotes.quote: When you can look at failure and say, 'What is the worst case scenario,' it's not as bad as it seems
en_quotes.author: Whitney Wolfe Herd

en_quotes.quote: Failure is an enigma. You worry about it, and it teaches you something
en_quotes.author: James Dyson

en_quotes.quote: It's not that we fly by the seat of our pants. We're not afraid of failure
en_quotes.author: Craig Ferguson

en_quotes.quote: Failure is more frequently from want of energy than want of capital
en_quotes.author: Daniel Webster

en_quotes.quote: Our failings sometimes bind us to one another as closely as could virtue itself
en_quotes.author: Luc de Clapiers

en_quotes.quote: It's a European Union of economic failure, of mass unemployment and of low growth
en_quotes.author: Nigel Farage

en_quotes.quote: If you die, you're not a failure
en_quotes.author: Valerie Harper

en_quotes.quote: Failure doesn't exist. It's only a change of direction
en_quotes.author: Alejandro Jodorowsky

en_quotes.quote: Failure. It doesn't exist. 'Failure' is just what happens when we lose perspective
en_quotes.author: Donna Brazile

en_quotes.quote: I don't have any fear of failure whatsoever. I used to, and I told myself I wouldn't allow myself to anymore
en_quotes.author: Jaylen Brown

en_quotes.quote: Failure in the theater is more dramatic and uglier than any other form of writing. It costs so much, you feel so guilty
en_quotes.author: Lillian Hellman

en_quotes.quote: Pure unadulterated success is not as funny as failure
en_quotes.author: Will Arnett

en_quotes.quote: Smokey Robinson writes the heartfelt songs, whereas it was my job to write the songs about weakness and failure in love
en_quotes.author: Elvis Costello

en_quotes.quote: The hippy movement was a failure
en_quotes.author: Joe Strummer

en_quotes.quote: I have never, ever considered myself a failure
en_quotes.author: Eddie the Eagle

en_quotes.quote: I'm drawn to failure. I feel like I'm contending with it constantly in my own life
en_quotes.author: Joyce Carol Oates

en_quotes.quote: Tasting failure, even when you truly believe in a project, is a critical part of the growth process
en_quotes.author: Daniel Lubetzky

en_quotes.quote: I feel rejecting rejection is one of the most crucial steps in getting past failure
en_quotes.author: John Rampton

en_quotes.quote: At some point, you have to declare an idea dead and, if not a failure, then at least not a success
en_quotes.author: Michael Gerber

en_quotes.quote: Failure is simply the non-presence of success. But a fiasco is a disaster of mythic proportions
en_quotes.author: Orlando Bloom

en_quotes.quote: Anything less than gold is a failure to me. It's extreme pressure, but I hold myself to a high standard
en_quotes.author: Jordan Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: Like anyone, I'm scared of failure. That drives you to work really hard
en_quotes.author: David Droga

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes people call me a success for all the reasons that make me think I'm a failure
en_quotes.author: William Hurt

en_quotes.quote: The world is divided into two categories: failures and unknowns
en_quotes.author: Francis Picabia

en_quotes.quote: Failure is an amazing data point that tells you which direction not to go
en_quotes.author: Payal Kadakia

en_quotes.quote: A traveller must buy his own experience, and success or failure depends mainly on personal idiosyncrasies
en_quotes.author: Isabella Bird

en_quotes.quote: I didn't allow failure to break my heart. So I wouldn't allow success to bloat my head
en_quotes.author: Randeep Hooda

en_quotes.quote: I've had my share of struggle. I believe, never take success to your head or failure to your heart
en_quotes.author: Randeep Hooda

en_quotes.quote: I don't understand a way to work other than bold-facedly running towards failure
en_quotes.author: Cate Blanchett

en_quotes.quote: Philanthropic colonization is a failure. National colonization will succeed
en_quotes.author: Theodor Herzl

en_quotes.quote: Failure is a word that I simply don't accept
en_quotes.author: John H. Johnson

en_quotes.quote: I was convicted of three misdemeanors of willful failure to file a form
en_quotes.author: Wesley Snipes

en_quotes.quote: Defeat may serve as well as victory to shake the soul and let the glory out
en_quotes.author: Edwin Markham

en_quotes.quote: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will
en_quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

en_quotes.quote: As an individual, I have no fear of failure... I think that translates on-screen in my performances
en_quotes.author: Taapsee Pannu

en_quotes.quote: Admitting failure is quite cleansing, but never - pleasurable
en_quotes.author: Michael Morpurgo

en_quotes.quote: Whenever you start a new business, the sheer number of variables at hand makes failure a constant possibility
en_quotes.author: Sallie Krawcheck

en_quotes.quote: Anybody who dies with money in the bank is a failure
en_quotes.author: Dan Gilbert

en_quotes.quote: Never walk away from failure. On the contrary, study it carefully and imaginatively for its hidden assets
en_quotes.author: Michael Korda

en_quotes.quote: The only reason my work seems to be eclectic up to a certain period is because I was a failure as an actor
en_quotes.author: Hugh Grant

en_quotes.quote: For me, utter failure is to make a film that people pay their money to go see and they don't like
en_quotes.author: Peter Jackson

en_quotes.quote: I research best practices and recipes for success and failure to craft personalised policies for my city
en_quotes.author: Aja Brown

en_quotes.quote: Failure's a natural part of life
en_quotes.author: John Malkovich

en_quotes.quote: There are people who say that you can't experiment... That condemns you to failure
en_quotes.author: Jose Mujica

en_quotes.quote: I've been blissfully ignorant about the result of my films and don't get swayed by success or failure
en_quotes.author: Nithya Menen

en_quotes.quote: Success unshared is failure
en_quotes.author: John Paul DeJoria

en_quotes.quote: I read somewhere that failure is an event, not a person, but I never feel that way. It's who I am
en_quotes.author: Jeff Van Gundy

en_quotes.quote: I have always believed that it's important to show a new look periodically. Predictability can lead to failure
en_quotes.author: T. Boone Pickens

en_quotes.quote: To fall in the Copa del Rey is a failure
en_quotes.author: Sergio Ramos

en_quotes.quote: Failure's not a bad thing. It builds character. It makes you stronger
en_quotes.author: Billy Dee Williams

en_quotes.quote: If you're 40 years old and you've never had a failure, you've been deprived
en_quotes.author: Gloria Swanson

en_quotes.quote: Before you can win a game, you have to not lose it
en_quotes.author: Chuck Noll

en_quotes.quote: The failure of The Cable Guy impacted my career. I had to start writing and acting again
en_quotes.author: Ben Stiller

en_quotes.quote: Success is a public affair. Failure is a private funeral
en_quotes.author: Rosalind Russell

en_quotes.quote: I think I've failed every test I've ever taken. If there was a failure I would have been it
en_quotes.author: Lisa Marie Presley

en_quotes.quote: Low standards are a tactic that takes pressure off teachers' unions by accepting mediocrity and failure for kids
en_quotes.author: Jeb Bush

en_quotes.quote: Failure? Scared to death of it
en_quotes.author: Ryan Seacrest

en_quotes.quote: Much worse than the unavoidable inefficiencies of large government is the failure to fund the government we need
en_quotes.author: Richard Cohen

en_quotes.quote: Over the next four years, we will be bold. We will be willing to experiment. We will not fear failure
en_quotes.author: Matt Blunt

en_quotes.quote: Boston has carried the practice of hypocrisy to the n-th degree of refinement, grace, and failure
en_quotes.author: Lincoln Steffens

en_quotes.quote: Failure is the most terrible thing in our business. When we fail, the whole world knows about it
en_quotes.author: Desi Arnaz

en_quotes.quote: The more control you have over your life, the more responsible you feel for your own success - or failure
en_quotes.author: Arthur C. Brooks

en_quotes.quote: I assume everything I do in life is gonna be a failure, and then if it turns up roses, then I'm psyched
en_quotes.author: Jonah Hill

en_quotes.quote: You always pass failure on your way to success
en_quotes.author: Mickey Rooney

en_quotes.quote: I think I'm less afraid of failure than some others
en_quotes.author: Russell Simmons

en_quotes.quote: President Obama's greatest failure is his failure regarding foreign policy and national security
en_quotes.author: Elise Stefanik

en_quotes.quote: In Iraq we must succeed. Failure is not an option
en_quotes.author: Zbigniew Brzezinski

en_quotes.quote: Life is nothing but a bunch of experiences. There's no such thing as success or failure
en_quotes.author: Suki Waterhouse

en_quotes.quote: Every individual suffers from the fear of failure, but you can change your destiny only when you overcome it
en_quotes.author: Anupam Kher

en_quotes.quote: The federal government has been a proven failure in picking winners and losers in the energy sector
en_quotes.author: Mike Pompeo

en_quotes.quote: If terrorists are already on our southern border, a national-security failure has already occurred
en_quotes.author: Mike Pompeo

en_quotes.quote: Success and failure are equally surprising
en_quotes.author: Daryl Hall

en_quotes.quote: I failed first grade, which is my biggest problem. You always feel like a failure, like you're stupid
en_quotes.author: Amy Sedaris

en_quotes.quote: Risk is to do something that 99 percent of the time would be a failure
en_quotes.author: Ferran Adria

en_quotes.quote: The very reasons sometimes that you make a film are the reasons for its failure
en_quotes.author: Sydney Pollack

en_quotes.quote: Failure of a film doesn't diminish my love for acting
en_quotes.author: Aditya Roy Kapur

en_quotes.quote: Well, I think it's too early to call Fallujah a failure
en_quotes.author: Chuck Schumer

en_quotes.quote: Success can be destructive to the creative process. I say it all the time: success is as dangerous as total failure
en_quotes.author: Marilyn Minter

en_quotes.quote: Losing is no disgrace if you've given your best
en_quotes.author: Jim Palmer

en_quotes.quote: We all struggle with our failure to communicate and our failure to reach beyond fear to love people
en_quotes.author: Mira Sorvino

en_quotes.quote: We've been conditioned to think that quitting is a failure, a form of failure. How do we know that that's true?
en_quotes.author: Stephen J. Dubner

en_quotes.quote: I'm not scared of anything in particular, but I am motivated by a fear of failure as opposed to a need to succeed
en_quotes.author: Heston Blumenthal

en_quotes.quote: Fear of failure has always been my best motivator
en_quotes.author: Douglas Wood

en_quotes.quote: Most people think of success and failure as opposites, but they both are products of the same process
en_quotes.author: Roger von Oech

en_quotes.quote: I love language, and I love the failure of language
en_quotes.author: Nate Lowman

en_quotes.quote: Don't be afraid of failure; be afraid of petty success
en_quotes.author: Maude Adams
